components.buttonStyle: Large touch targets (64px+ height) with gentle rounded corners, immediate haptic feedback, child-scale sizing
components.cardStyle: Soft elevation with warm backgrounds, generous padding for visual breathing room
components.inputStyle: Extra-large interactive elements (32px+ thumbs), high-contrast visual feedback
components.navigationStyle: Minimal, gesture-based child navigation with hidden parent controls via long-press

childCentricFeatures.visualFeedback: Immediate scaling, color changes, and haptic confirmation
childCentricFeatures.errorPrevention: Confirmation dialogs, easy undo, forgiving interactions
childCentricFeatures.focusManagement: Single primary action visible, minimal cognitive load
